title: 79/539/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 May 1979 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (region of Calabria) pursuant to Title II of Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 29 May 1979  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (region of Calabria) pursuant to Title II of Directive 75/268/EEC  (Only the Italian text is authentic)  (79/539/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The rules of Law No 21 of 20 August 1977 of the region of Calabria and the Regulation of 7 February 1979 fixing the compensatory allowances for mountain and hill farming areas and farming in certain less-favoured areas satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measures as referred to in Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1979.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1.
